member.name: T:DeepSleep.ContentDisposition
member.summary: Represents a Multipart content disposition header
member.remarks: In [RFC2183] there is a discussion of the "Content-Disposition" header field and the description of the initial values allowed in this header. Additional values may be registered with the IANA following the procedures in section 9 of [RFC2183].

member.name: P:DeepSleep.ContentDisposition.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file.

member.name: T:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType
member.summary: In [RFC2183] there is a discussion of the "Content-Disposition" header field and the description of the initial values allowed in this header. Additional values may be registered with the IANA following the procedures in section 9 of [RFC2183]. See http://www.iana.org/assignments/cont-disp/cont-disp.xhtml

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.alert
member.summary: The body is a custom ring tone to alert the user

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.by_reference
member.summary: The body needs to be handled according to a reference to the body that is located in the same SIP message as the body.

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.early_session
member.summary: The body describes an early communications session, for example, and [RFC2327] SDP body

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.icon
member.summary: The body is displayed as an icon to the user

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.info_package
member.summary: The body contains information associated with an Info Package

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.notification
member.summary: The payload of the message carrying this Content-Disposition header field value is an Instant Message Disposition Notification as requested in the corresponding Instant Message.

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.recipient_list
member.summary: The body includes a list of URIs to which URI-list services are to be applied.

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.recipient_list_history
member.summary: The body contains a list of URIs that indicates the recipients of the request

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.render
member.summary: The body should be displayed to the user

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.session
member.summary: The body describes a communications session, for example, an RFC2327 SDP body

member.name: F:DeepSleep.ContentDispositionType.signal
member.summary: Tunneled content to be processed silently
